## Installing RStudio (IDE) 

- R Studio makes using R a lot easier! 
- They are now under the bigger association POSIT

<p>
![RStudio download page](./pics/Install6.png){width=70%}
</p>
<p>
![Download RStudio Desktop (free version)](./pics/Install7.png){width=70%}
</p>
<p>
![Choose the one for your OS](./pics/Install8.png){width=70%}
</p>


R offers a help() function that you can use when you encounter
unfamiliar operators, functions, pacakges, etc. You can also use the shortcut
"?" symbol to do the same.

```{r}
help("%*%") # special characters 
?mean # alphanumeric
help("+")
```
